title: Drawing, "Themistocles", 1811
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink: Temistocle
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Themistocles shown standing at post and pointing at ship. Altar dedicated to Apollo beside him. Priest conducting service and crowd behind it.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Themistocles", 1811.
1811. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3335.
